rukus.text: yaayyuha alladhina amanu khudhu hidh'rakum fa-infiru thubatin awi infiru jamiʿan
wa-inna minkum laman layubatti-anna fa-in asabatkum musibatun qala qad anʿama l-lahu ʿalayya idh lam akun maʿahum shahidan
wala-in asabakum fadlun mina l-lahi layaqulanna ka-an lam takun baynakum wabaynahu mawaddatun yalaytani kuntu maʿahum fa-afuza fawzan ʿaziman
falyuqatil fi sabili l-lahi alladhina yashruna l-hayata l-dun'ya bil-akhirati waman yuqatil fi sabili l-lahi fayuq'tal aw yaghlib fasawfa nu'tihi ajran ʿaziman

wama lakum la tuqatiluna fi sabili l-lahi wal-mus'tadʿafina mina l-rijali wal-nisai wal-wil'dani alladhina yaquluna rabbana akhrij'na min hadhihi l-qaryati l-zalimi ahluha wa-ij'ʿal lana min ladunka waliyyan wa-ij'ʿal lana min ladunka nasiran
alladhina amanu yuqatiluna fi sabili l-lahi wa-alladhina kafaru yuqatiluna fi sabili l-taghuti faqatilu awliyaa l-shaytani inna kayda l-shaytani kana daʿifan
